reviews.review:
Juegazo! Los niveles están muy entretenidos y jugarlo en cooperativo también, pero lo mejor de todo sin duda son los niveles del workshop. El contenido es tanto que siempre vas a encontrar niveles nuevos para jugar. 
Vale totalmente la pena comprarlo y si lo encuentras en rebaja como yo que lo conseguí a menos de 1 dólar pues muchísimo mejor.
Lo recomiendo sobretodo por el coop.

its a great game my uncle bought it for me when it was on discount me and him played it so yeah you should download it its fun


:D

Vous avez tapé sur Google "meilleurs jeux coop PC/Xb360" et vous êtes tombé sur Portal 2 en tête de tous les classement alors que le tritre figure déjà dans les meilleurs jeux solo ? Et bien rassurez-vous ce n'est pas une erreur.
probably my favorite game I've ever played.
L'histoire est vraiment cools. Le gameplay ? Incroyable, mais prenez un cachet pour le mal de crâne quand même juste histoire de...
Для игры с другом очень хорошая и веселая.
The perfect game to play on the day after your birthday. (I found that out by accident)
игра прикольная только играть не с кем ＞﹏＜

<장점>
포탈1은 포탈2를 위한 초석 같은 느낌. 모든 면에서 전작을 뛰어넘었다. 
스토리와 연출이 정말 훌륭하다. 등장인물들의 유쾌한 농담들도 재밌었다.
퍼즐 난이도도 매우 훌륭하다. 어려워서 좌절하다가도 시간을 좀 투자하면 거의 대부분의 퍼즐을 직접 해결할 수 있었고 성취감으로 이어졌다.
싱글 외에도 협동플레이, 개인 창작마당 등 놀거리가 가득하다.

<아쉬운점>
길찾기가 어려운 부분들이 있어서 좀 헤맸는데 찾기 좀 까다로웠다(내가 길치여서 그런 걸지도 모른다)
거의 10년전 게임이어서 그런지 로딩이 잦다.
번역이 오타등으로 매끄럽지 못하거나 글씨체가 읽기 힘든 것들이 있었다(ex.쪼아먹다가 쯔아먹다로 보임)
Меня стошнило пару раз, а так прикольно, как на карусели
beyin yakan yerleri olsa da sarıyo 〠

É tão bom (ou até melhor) do que o primeiro jogo, além de ser importante por dar continuidade ao primeiro jogo ele lhe apresenta novas e divertidas mecânicas o que é ótimo porque os puzzles não ficam repetitivos e te fazem quebrar a cabeça enquanto joga. Vale o preço pois a história é, de fato, intrigante, a dublagem é ótima, as músicas são boas, as piadas nos momentos inesperados, a boa trama, tudo isso em um jogo de puzzle é o que o faz ser magnífico, até o momento só joguei solo mesmo mas talvez futuramente jogue o modo co-op já que sozinho já é divertido quebrar a cabeça, imagine com os amigos. Talvez eu até platine o jogo, recomendo demais!

seni affediyorum Wheatley :)


oyunu alın ama portal 1 de alın 1 olmadan alırsanız saçma

It's Portal 2.

Been out for over 10 Years and honestly still great. If you haven't played it, just wait for a 90% or more discount and honestly it's gonna be the best dollar you've ever spent in your life.
Best game fun better than first portal liked much yes
a lot of fun, singleplayer campaign took me around 8 hours
超级超级超级好玩！不管是单人还是双人模式都很好玩，单人模式大部分都不难，有一些（我）需要看攻略。相信全部自己想出来的小伙伴一定很有成就感吧！我真的很喜欢这种解密小游戏~通关很有成就感~喜欢小型解密游戏的一定不要错过，喜欢双人游戏的朋友也一定要尝试，打折期7块（好像还有3块的时候）入手多香啊！顺便求推荐类似的游戏~
Ну это намного лучше игр 21 года
This is the best game I have ever played in my entire life
good, yeah, good. thumbs up! Yeah.
у гг норм задница я подрочил
神作基础上更上一层楼
Good game, I've almost memorised every test chamber and room

Крутая головоломка с интересными локациями и прикольным сюжетом. Можно спокойно отвлечься от игры и подумать над прохождением в свое удовольствие.
目前玩了前三关，稍微动一下脑子就能过去了，偶尔还可以坑一下损友，算是不错的消遣游戏

Now this is a certified banger. If you have a besties or bf/gf this is the perfect game for you. Its the perfect mix of actual puzzles to fuck around with your friend. My mate and I played the whole thing and it was hilarious, especially when we just killed each other for funsises. One of my all time favorite 2 player games.

this game is just as good if not way better than portal 1 the co-op is amazing i get people prob didnt like the longer story but for me i like how its longer wheatly is one of my fav characters in gaming now just because of this one game portal 2s story is a masterpiece for a whole bunch of reasons mainly because of all the plot and twists that happens i am not going to spoil portal 2 because you need to play it yourself i really reccommend you play portal 1 first or else you may not understand whats going on in portal 2 20/10 game definetly reccomend
отличный сюжет, головоломки идеальны, + можно создать свою! чтобы игроки страдали! ХАХАХА
就是说有趣而且费脑子，确实是容易晕，有的螺旋视野确实是看完想吐
